title: Travel vouchers and credits (future travel credits)
dataVerified: Traveler name, voucher amount, expiration date, issuing provider, voucher code
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Voucher status (valid/redeemed/expired). Link to provider system (traveler only, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake travel vouchers. Domain binding verifies airline/hotel/OTA. Voucher balance verification. Prevents double-redemption fraud. COVID-19 travel credit documentation.
